introduction: Adam, a famous actor, a man with typical troubles of the middle-aged male and difficulties in finding the meaning of life, gets a stroke and loses contact with the world. Doctors make a catastrophic diagnosis. His loving wife Agnieszka (Kinga Preis) does not give up. Patiently and with great determination fights for his health and for their love. In the lead role of Adam - Krzysztof Globisz - an actor who actually suffers from aphasia after a recent stroke. "True Life of Angles" is more than just a movie. It's a story about the fact, that when you lose everything that seemed important, you discover more that matter.
